articles.title: What Elon Musk Said On A Tweet On Parag Agrawal, Other Indian Tech CEOs - NDTV
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Monday gave a shout out to Indian talent in America after Paras Agrawal was appointed at the chief executive officer of Twitter.
articles.content:
New Delhi: Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Monday gave a shout out to Indian talent in America after Parag Agrawal was appointed at the chief executive officer of Twitter.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Messi wins Ballon d'Or for seventh time as Putellas crowned women's winner - Times of India
articles.description: Football News: Lionel Messi admitted winning the Copa America with Argentina might have been the determining factor in him claiming the men's Ballon d'Or prize for t
articles.content:
Congratulations Leo Messi and @alexiaputellas winners of the #BallonDor2021, congratulations also to all nominated https://t.co/uIKhLd3PJJ

articles.author: Richard Goldstein
articles.title: Lee Elder, Who Broke a Golf Color Barrier, Dies at 87 - The New York Times
articles.description: In his prime he played in a league for Black players, but in 1975, at 40, he became the first African- American to take part in the Masters tournament.
articles.content: His shot off the first tee was straight down the middle, but he ended up far back in the field in the first two rounds, shooting 74 and 78, and missed the cut to continue to play through the weekend … [+1515 chars]
